data.title: Is MotorStorm Apocalypse playable on any cloud gaming services?
data.meta_description: Check today’s availability of MotorStorm Apocalypse on the most popular cloud gaming services: GeForce Now, Boosteroid, Xbox, Shadow, Luna, PlayStation,
data.text:
Yes, MotorStorm Apocalypse is playable on Cloud Gaming. You can currently play it on 1 cloud gaming service: Playstation Cloud.

MotorStorm Apocalypse is available on:

MotorStorm Apocalypse is not available on:

Boosteroid Unavailable UnavailableGeForce Now Unavailable UnavailableShadow Unavailable Unavailableairgpu Unavailable UnavailableCloudDeck Unavailable UnavailableAmazon Luna Unavailable UnavailableXbox Cloud Unavailable UnavailableBlacknut Unavailable Unavailable

Found incorrect data? Please let us know. Thanks for your help!

Send us feedback

Description: MotorStorm: Apocalypse (released as MotorStorm 3 in Asia) is a 2011 racing 3D video game by Evolution Studios and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation 3. It is the fourth game in the MotorStorm series and the third for the PlayStation 3. It was announced shortly before the beginning of the Electronic Entertainment Expo 2010 on the PlayStation Blog by Evolution Studios on 10 June 2010. MotorStorm: Apocalypse was released in Europe on 16 March 2011 but the UK release on 18 March was delayed by Sony Computer Entertainment UK following the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami in Japan. The Australian launch went ahead as planned on 17 March, but Sony announced further shipments of the game to that country would be halted in the wake of the disaster. The planned North American release date of 12 April 2011 was delayed by Sony who later confirmed new releases dates of 31 March 2011 in the UK and 3 May 2011 in North America.

Publisher: Sony Computer Entertainment

Developer: Evolution Studios

Release Date: 16.03.2011

Frequently Asked Questions

For an overview of devices that support playing MotorStorm Apocalypse via cloud gaming, see the table below. It provides details about each device and the cloud gaming services they work with.

For an optimal cloud gaming experience, the requirements aren’t typically determined by the individual games like MotorStorm Apocalypse but rather the cloud gaming service and desired streaming quality.

Here’s a general breakdown:

Basic Gameplay: A minimum internet speed of 5 to 15 Mbps is usually required.

4K Cloud Gaming: For the best 4K streaming experience, a bandwidth of at least 40 Mbps is recommended.

For an in-depth look at various providers and their requirements, check the “Info” link in our availability boxes above. For broader insights and tips on optimization, explore our guide on cloud gaming internet speed requirements.

No, MotorStorm Apocalypse is not offered for free on any cloud gaming service at this time.

To explore ways to play games for free on cloud platforms, do visit our free cloud gaming guide. And don’t forget to browse our free cloud games list for other free titles.

No, playing MotorStorm Apocalypse on Cloud Gaming with a controller is not supported at this time. Should this change, we’ll keep you informed here.

No, at the moment you can’t play MotorStorm Apocalypse multiplayer on cloud gaming. Should this change, we’ll keep you informed here.
